Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Laura D Walker
Reviews.Content: Nice phone.  No visible defects.  Works well. No problem connecting to my local Caribbean Network.  No issues with it so far.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone. Works fine in S. America on Movistar, Tigo & Claro 3G networks and in U.S on AT&T; 3G.
Reviews.Author: KC
Reviews.Content: The 3 1/2" screen (size of I Phone) was to small, the G3 was to large and the S3-MINI, well a perfect size to read, write and keep in a pants or shirt pocket. Speed is fast in 3G, just DO NOT load your phone up with every app you find or you can experience some major slowing. This is not a 3g Mini issue, this applies to any smart phone on the market.As the title states, this phone WILL work on 3G in South America using MOVISTAR, TIGO or CLARO. I travel there quite a bit and tested this phone on my last trip using each of the three companies Sim chips. The 3G data was transmitted on the 850 band width. Just make sure your phone is the "L" model. I have found the 3G speeds to be fine for GPS directions and turn by turn mapping while driving. No phone freezing or lag time.In the U.S, this phone will work in 3G on AT&T;, either a contract or " Go Phone". IT WILL NOT WORK WITH T-MOBILE in 3G data. It will work with T-Mobile on their 2G bands.Battery life is good and the screen is bright and clear. Speakers are loud and clear for calls and I have had no problems with the listener being able to understand me. A car charger is a must have if you drive.This phone has the SAMSUNG-DIVE anti theft software installed so you can easily track your phone, lock it or wipe you data in the event it is lost or stolen. This service is FREE since it is a Samsung device. Go to SAMSUNGDIVE.COM to get all the technical info about how this service works.Another thing I like about this phone is NO branded locked in software that you can't remove. No branding so you don't get any carrier start up screens.We purchased three of these phones. One for my wife, one for me and a spare.SWYPE & DRAGON. This is a must have program in my opinion. SWYPE is fast for typing and DRAGON is lightning fast (and accurate) converting speech to text. Great for emails and texting. These programs work great on this phone.Have not found any negatives with this phone yet and don't expect any. For under $300.00 this is a great value, nice feature set. Samsung put just the right amount of apps on this phone that 90% of people will find themselves using. No useless junk ware.I am not a gamer, so I can't speak to gaming on this phone with regards to game speeds or screen freeze.As far as repair work, it is important to know that the major carriers in S. America DO SELL the G3 Mini (i8190L) so in the event you needed a new screen or other service work, they should have the parts and technical data available to work on your phone.Only thing to add would be to get yourself a good screen protector and a case that protects the corners in the event you should drop it.So get it and start enjoying it. I nice phone at a decent price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Negri de Farias
Reviews.Content: This item was bought to be used in Brazil so it was mandatory to really be unlocked. Although I was skeptic the product arrived and worked in the first momment after being turned on and it still is.

Reviews.Title: My wife loved it
Reviews.Author: Rafael Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I bought this item as a gift for my wife to be used in Ecuador since she was sick of all BlackBerry device hanging problems she faced daily. She really loved this mobile and so do my kids!!!

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: rbcoolest
Reviews.Content: I adquired it for international use in Venezuela it works perfectly with all operators, good processing unit and works really fast, is one of the few phones you can get now with a small price for e shopping in the country

Reviews.Title: Good buy!
Reviews.Author: Mike Torres
Reviews.Content: The overall design of this phone is very good and very high quality. The color "Grey Titanium" makes the phone look very elegant.The screen is bright and shiny, and the touch system responds great. However, I was able to see that it is a little slower than the iphone 4s, it takes a little longer to open and close applications, load web pages through 3g etc. It does it very good, but it is noticeable.The camera is EXTREMELY good. The day pictures with little light or flash , come out great. The videos are also excellent quality. The only thing I don't like about the camera is that it takes too long to focus; when there is minimal movement, it is extremely easy for the picture to come out blurry.Everything else is great. Since it is unlocked and due to the frequencies the phone works with, I can use a Mexican simcard or USA simcard without a problem.For the price, it's one of the best phones you can purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great phone! but...
Reviews.Author: Sandra Aguilar
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a phone that isnt as big as the s3 galaxy or s4 galaxy, this is it! takes great pictures, and has a lot of great features just as the other 2 phones.UPDATEdd REVIEWFor anyone wondering if this phone will work outside of USA make sure you do get the product you ordered. i have been living in USA and the phone worked fine with ATT, but now that i am back in HONDURAS this phone turns out does not have a 850 frecuency. also the name of the item has an L and the item i received did not have the same name. I caught these issues a little late so i doubt i can return the item, but pretty much its useless to me as it only works with EDGE with my network provider TIGO and it is tediously slow and sometimes i even have to connect it with WIFI at home or anywhere else i go because its horribly slow. I will have to end up buying a phone here at home which is a bit expensive and have to figue out how to get rid of this phone as i doubt anyone will buy it from me because it only works with edge... BIG DISAPPOINTMENT!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos Conde
Reviews.Content: Great acquisition, work even better that what I expected. Fulfill my needs since I needed the phone to connect in Latin America.

Reviews.Title: So good, I bought another
Reviews.Author: Scythe
Reviews.Content: This phone works great, same specs as the GT-i890 just on the 850 frequency for LIME in Barbados. I bought another for my friend

Reviews.Title: no problem at all in these firsts 3 months
Reviews.Author: Andrei Brandao Polivanov
Reviews.Content: The size is very good for men, with no purses. The camera is better then the iphones for sure. Overall: 4 stars

Reviews.Title: no 3g
Reviews.Author: cassie
Reviews.Content: the only problem i have had was that i don't have 3g coverage anymore and i go through straight talk. i haven't tried to get a new sims card yet but i suspect that may be the problem.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Esteban Guerra
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift for my girlfriend, she is using it a lot without any problems, and from Argentina!

Reviews.Title: COOOL!!
Reviews.Author: Geraldine
Reviews.Content: tHIS CELPHONE IS COOL!!!!!!!!!! i JUST LOVE HIS FUNCTIONS, their cappacity to surf on the internet, the keyboard is just amazing!!!!!! I love it!!!!!!!!!!!!it works for Venezuela!

Reviews.Title: Good phone.
Reviews.Author: J. Smith "J-Rod"
Reviews.Content: So far it has been a good phone.  Recently have had some issues with getting txt notificatons but other than that it's been a pretty good phone.  Battery life isn't that great but with a power saving app and aftermarket battery it can last a full day of heavy usage.  Lags a little on opening and closing apps.  Talk, txt and web work fine.  Just a run of the mill phone nowadays.

Reviews.Title: Good product.... but
Reviews.Author: Rafael Briceno
Reviews.Content: The phone is great! good price and performance...BUT. no charger with it, so I'm a little disapointed. sorry, but that is a fact.

Reviews.Title: Good but...
Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: I can used with Digitel in Venezuela because only works with edge.  I have to change my phone number if i whant 3G or H+

Reviews.Title: Samsung galaxy s3 mini
Reviews.Author: Rivon Skeete
Reviews.Content: It took me a long time to decide on this product and I am certainly not disappointed with what I received. My only problem is withthe packaging with respect to  language. The material provided was in spanish only, however this does not  distract from the quality of the product. A hint for the manufacturer " The turn-off button is opposite the volume button, holding the unit in one hand as many users do ,the volume is usually reduced unintentionally.

Reviews.Title: Excelent buy for me!
Reviews.Author: Ana Jacquelinne Bueno Perez "Miami"
Reviews.Content: Excelent phone! Perfect for do calls and navegate in internet! Have wifi connection that funcion perfect to me! No problems with charge, calls, games, or for play vídeos or movies, excelent buy for me!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: No complaints from de phone or the seller. The phone is beautiful, easy to use and lightweight. Perfect to my dad.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Aly Garcia Rosales
Reviews.Content: Meets expectations is a version that I really like, is undoubtedly high gamma and the seller is excellent I get what I asked for, so worth giving thanks for what it offers and for the good service.

Reviews.Title: Phone Works Great!
Reviews.Author: TinaK
Reviews.Content: I have been using the phone for 2 & 1/2 mths now.  No issues with phone! ! Phone works great! A little slow @ times but great non the less.  Only fault I found was with the chrgr. It took for evrrrr to chrge the phone! Ended up buying a new chrgr

Reviews.Title: Ideal Phone
Reviews.Author: Alejandro C. Carias R "Alejandro C."
Reviews.Content: This is a very confortable cel phone for his size, really easy to use and powerfull enought to the daily work

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Bianca
Reviews.Content: this was for my brother and im thinking on getting one for me too. arrived on time and the size is perfect

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: One Vanilla
Reviews.Content: This phone is great! its small and everything is perfect! The camera is great and has a good flash. I really recommend it

Reviews.Title: Phone language is not English so I cannot use same
Reviews.Author: Rosemarie Wilks
Reviews.Content: I just bout a Samsung GT-i8190L and cannot use it as I cannot read the language.  Please help or I will have to return it

Reviews.Title: Nicer than expected
Reviews.Author: AROD
Reviews.Content: Phone looks so nice that makes my current iPhone 4S look almost antiquate... good job Samsung!. The screen is very bright.

ProductInfo.Features:
Design - Galaxy SIII mini resembles Galaxy SIII's minimal and organic design inspired by nature. Its human-centric nature provides an ergonomic and comfortable experience with enhanced usability. Its comfortable grip and gentle curves deliver a natural feel and design.
4.0 AMOLED Display - This is what we call seeing reality. Its beautiful 4.0-inch Super AMOLED display offers a generous viewing experience that lets you view multimedia and Web content in brilliant color and clarity.
Pop up play - Pop up play allows you to send text messages while watching a video. It is compact but it still lets you do things simultaneously.
Jelly Bean OS - Powered by Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean), the latest version of the world's most popular smartphone operating system. Jelly Bean has fast, fluid and smooth graphics along with a new Google Search experience featuring Google Now, which brings you just the right information, before you even ask.Specifications
OS - Android OS, v4.1 (Jelly Bean)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Gt-i8190 L Galaxy S3 Mini GRAY 3G - 850 / 1900 / 2100 Mhz factory Unlocked International Verison
